# Gonzalo's thoughts

> Some thoughts about things
>
> Blog by Gonzalo Fernandez-Victorio, covering technology, programming, and various technical topics.
> Available in English and Spanish.

## About

Gonzalo Fernandez-Victorio is a software engineer sharing thoughts and experiences through this blog.
The blog has been active since 2008, with 175 posts covering a wide range of topics.

- Website: https://gonzalo.f-v.es/
- Blog (English): https://gonzalo.f-v.es/blog
- Blog (Spanish): https://gonzalo.f-v.es/es/blog
- GitHub: https://github.com/gonfva
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/gonzalofernandezvictorio/

## Featured Posts

No featured posts have been marked yet. Add `featured: true` to post front matter to highlight posts here.
